text: Perch Zeytuntsyan (, July 18, 1938 - August 21, 2017) was an Egyptian-born Armenian playwright and screenwriter. He served as Minister of Culture of Armenia from 1990 to 1991. In 1975, Zeytuntsyan became the executive secretary of the Writerâ€™s Union of Armenia, a position he held until 1981. He went on to become the Minister of Culture in the first post-Soviet administration of the Republic of Armenia.Parlakian, Nishanm and Cowe, S. Peter, eds. Modern Armenian Drama: An Anthology.
